Judul: MISSION TO MAP UNIVERSE IN HIGH-ENERGY X-RAY
Abstrak: Have you seen your body in X-rays? It looks completely different,” says Rashid Sunyaev. “We will do the same with the Universe.” Sunyaev, a Sovietborn cosmologist at the Max Planck Institute for Astrophysics in Garching, Germany, could be about to get his long-held wish.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
